fields.Title: Ezra Pound Conference
fields.Description/Abstract:
A conference examining contemporary attitudes towards the Modernist Poet and his continuing influence. I have successfully secured four of the most important Pound/Modernist Scholars Marjorie Perloff (Stanford), Peter Quartermain (Simon Frazer), Peter Nicholls, (NYU) and Bob Perelman (Penn) as Speakers. The premier Pound Journal Sagetrieb (UMaine) has promised to dedicate an issue to the conference papers. This promises to be an internationally important gathering of Pound scholars at BSU. 
Partners:  Log Cabin
The Modern Hotel
Description of Partner:  The Log Cabin will provide venue help for the conference.
The Modern Hotel are providing a discount for conference goers.
Role:  Principal
